Resistances.string: bludgeoning from nonmagical attacks that aren’t adamantine
piercing from nonmagical attacks that aren’t adamantine
slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren’t adamantine

MonsterTrait.Name: Earth Glide
MonsterTrait.Text: The xorn can burrow through nonmagical, unworked earth and stone. While doing so, the xorn doesn’t disturb the material it moves through.

MonsterTrait.Name: Stone Camouflage
MonsterTrait.Text: The xorn has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in rocky terrain.

MonsterTrait.Name: Treasure Sense
MonsterTrait.Text: The xorn can pinpoint, by scent, the location of precious metals and stones, such as coins and gems, within 60 feet of it.

MonsterTrait.Name: Multiattack
MonsterTrait.Text: The xorn makes three claw attacks and one bite attack.

MonsterAction.Name: Claw
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage.

MonsterAction.Name: Bite
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (3d6 + 3) piercing damage.
